Uses of Class
com.mySTARS.Entities.StaffAccount

Packages that use StaffAccount 
Package Description
com.mySTARS.Boundary
com.mySTARS.boundary is a group of classes that act as the boundary between the users and the program's system.
com.mySTARS.Control
com.mySTARS.control is used for control classes handling actions within the system
